meanings.definition: Convert (an image or font) into pixels for display on a computer screen.
meanings.sent1: The software rasterizes the logo to show it on the screen.
meanings.sent2: She rasterizes the picture to make it appear on the monitor.
meanings.sent3: The program rasterizes the font, making it look like tiny squares on the screen.
meanings.sent4: His mind rasterizes the image, breaking it down into digital dots.
meanings.sent5: The tool rasterizes the graphic, transforming it into a digital mosaic.

meanings.definition: To render an image in a raster format.
meanings.sent1: The device rasterizes the photo for printing purposes.
meanings.sent2: They rasterize the design to fit the screen resolution.
meanings.sent3: The artist rasterizes the painting, turning it into a digital grid.
meanings.sent4: The software rasterizes the image, creating a pattern of pixels.
meanings.sent5: The program rasterizes the artwork, converting it into a pixelated version.
